sentences.en: Caroline was very much a prude. She wouldn't let me see her naked.
sentences.cn: 卡罗琳是个过于一本正经的人。她不肯让我看到她的裸体。

sentences.en: Don't be such a prude you can carry modesty too far!
sentences.cn: 别那麽拘谨——你谦虚得太过分了.

sentences.en: She is such a prude that she is even embarrassed by the sight of naked children.
sentences.cn: 她正经得出了格,甚至见了赤身露体的孩子也难为情.

sentences.en: She was such a prude that she was even embarrassed by the sight of naked children.
sentences.cn: 她正经得出了格,甚至见了赤身露体的孩子也难为情.

sentences.en: They've been harassing us for years, you'd probably enjoy yourself there more anyway, prude!
sentences.cn: 他们已经让我们烦恼好几年了, 总之你大概会喜欢那里, 假正经!

words.tran_cn: 假正经的行为；过分拘谨的言行

trans.tran_cn: <贬>极端或过分拘谨的人，（尤指对性问题）大惊小怪的人
trans.tran_en: If you call someone a prude, you mean that they are too easily shocked by things relating to sex
